hangle: 이 녀석, 남자 주인공인 시그렌 아냐?!
first_translate: isn’t this guy siegren, the male protagonist?!
the story doesn’t start for another six years...

hangle: 왜 남주가 벌써 내 코앞에서 굴러다니고 있는 거지?
first_translate: then why is he already here right before my eyes?

hangle: 얘가 이 시기에 아벨을 만나는 거던가?
first_translate: does that mean he’s going to meet abel soon...?

hangle: 아니, 지금 이런 생각 할 때가 아니지!
first_translate: no! now isn’t the time to think about things like that!

hangle: 이 녀석이 이 세계를 구원할 남주가 맞다면
first_translate: if this kid really is the hero destined to save the world,
and if I let him die after saving me, then the world will end!
I’m still gonna be the final boss no matter what I do!!

hangle: 여, 여기 빨리 의원 좀 불러 주세요!
first_translate: p-please call for a doctor immediately!
two days later
hmm...
it was quite serious,
but fortunately, you’re out of danger now.
really? thank goodness!
let us know if anything happens.
okay!
that’s good news!
now we’ve avoided the apocalypse!
still though...

hangle: 세계를 구할 영웅이라며 칭송받을 거라곤 안 믿기네.
first_translate: this boy looks nothing like someone who’ll become known as the savior of the world someday.

hangle: 이 시기면 시그렌 나이가 열네 살쯤인가…?
first_translate: siegren must only be around fourteen at this point...

hangle: 나도 간단하게 몇 줄 설정만 했을 뿐,
first_translate: all I did was write up his character description briefly,

hangle: 본편에서 세세하게 다룬 적은 없는 시그렌의 과거.
first_translate: as his past wasn’t covered thoroughly in the original novel.

hangle: 시그렌은 남자 주인공답게 출생의 비밀을 가지고 있다.
first_translate: like any other main character, siegren has secrets surrounding his birth.

hangle: 그는 내가 현재 있는 제국의 황자다.
first_translate: to put it simply, he’s currently a prince of the empire.
more specifically, he’s an illegitimate child whose existence hasn’t been made public yet.

hangle: 시그렌은 힘없는 평민 출신의 어머니에게서 태어났다.
first_translate: siegren was born from a mother who came from a family of powerless commoners.

hangle: 그를 눈엣가시처럼 여겨 죽이고 싶어 하는 자들은 많았다.
first_translate: naturally, there were many people who wanted him dead because they saw him as a threat.

hangle: 시그렌은 어릴 적부터 늘 목숨을 위협받으며 살아왔다.
first_translate: from a young age, siegren lived under constant threats against his life.
029eventually, he ran away to hailon in the north.

hangle: 제국의 맨 끝이라 목숨을 노리는 자들의 영향력이 미치지 않았기 때문이다.
first_translate: he chose that place since it was farthest from those trying to kill him.

hangle: 그 후 아벨이 시그렌이 가진 검의 재능을 알아보고,
first_translate: later on, abel discovered siegren had talent with swords,
and decided to take him in as his student.
that pretty much sums up siegren’s childhood.

hangle: 본편에서도 여주인공에게 짧게 말해 준 게 끝이었다.
first_translate: in the actual novel, all these details are mentioned by the female lead very briefly.

hangle: 인물의 과거는 그저 성격을 나타내 줄 ‘설정’에 불과하니까.
first_translate: a person’s backstory is just something used to explain their personality traits.
on top of that, this kind of setting is extremely cliché in fantasy novels.
but...

hangle: 이 모든 일을 이 애가 실제로 겪었다고 생각하니까….
first_translate: when I think about how everything actually happened to this poor boy...
you went through so much hardship.
I’m truly sorry.
even though I plan to leave when the time comes,

hangle: 그래도 반성의 의미를 담아 여기 있을 동안은 얘한테 잘해줘야겠다.
first_translate: for now, I want to treat him well while I can.

hangle: 게다가 시그렌은 나중에 날 죽일 예정이잖아?
first_translate: not to mention, siegren plans to kill me eventually anyway.

hangle: 혹시 모르니까 친하게 지낼 필요가 있어!
first_translate: I need to make friends with him just in case!

hangle: 이 누나가 진짜 성심성의껏 돌볼 테니,
first_translate: I promise to look after you sincerely,
so please don’t forget about me when you grow older... or better yet, spare my life.

hangle: 시그렌 신경 쓴다고 제대로 못 잤더니 너무 졸려…
first_translate: I didn’t sleep properly last night because I kept thinking about siegren... I’m exhausted.
I guess I’ll rest my eyes for a bit...

hangle: 뒷일은 시그렌이 정신을 차리면 생각해 보자….
first_translate: I’ll worry about everything else once siegren wakes up...
yawn
how long have I slept?
huh?
do I sense someone looking at me...?
oh.
are you awake now?!
g-good morning!
it’s nice meeting you!
wow.
seeing him clearly now, he does seem handsome.

hangle: 그런데 어려서 그런지 날 선 고양이 같아.
first_translate: but maybe due to his youthfulness, he also seems rather prickly.
thanks for helping me back there.
I thought he’d be more laid-back considering he’s the main character.
where am I...?
we’re inside hailon castle.
who are you?
my name is fiona. what about yours?
s-siegren.
wait, but how come I’m alive...?

hangle: 날 안고 구른 게 생각나지 않나?
first_translate: don’t you remember rolling down the hill together?

hangle: 무의식중에 사람을 돕다니, 과연 남자 주인공.
first_translate: helping others without even realizing it himself... talk about being a typical male protagonist.
I brought you here and asked the physician to heal your wounds.
what?
yes, I know it sounds strange,

hangle: 난 네 몸 상태가 더 신경 쓰인단다.
first_translate: but honestly, I care more about your condition than anything else.
although he may be the male protagonist, he’s still just a little kid.

hangle: 막연한 상상과 당장 눈앞의 현실의 차이는 엄청났다.
first_translate: there’s such a huge difference between imagining something versus seeing it happen firsthand.

hangle: 시그렌이 다친 모습을 보니 죄책감이 장난이 아니다.
first_translate: after witnessing siegren getting hurt, I couldn’t help but feel guilty.

hangle: 난 왜 남주 과거를 불행하다고 설정해서….
first_translate: why did I set his past to be so tragic?!
